text: SpaceX likely doesn't pay taxes due to years of losses. Federal contracts are the main source of revenue for the company.
creator: Susanne Craig and Kirsten Grind

text: Trump pushes for Putin-Zelensky meeting to end Ukraine war, Europeans resist yielding key cities and Trump designates Rubio to draft security guarantees.
creator: Michael R. Gordon

OpenAI CEO Aravind Srinivas reflects on the lessons learned from the backlash against GPT-5 and the browser wars, highlighting the importance of responsive decision-making in the face of rapid technological change.
creator: Kevin Roose, Casey Newton, Rachel Cohn, Whitney Jones, John Woo, Katie McMurran, Dan Powell, Marion Lozano and Rowan Niemisto

text: U.S. and NATO forces are testing their mettle in the harsh Arctic conditions, where international tensions are simmering. The brutal environment is pushing the limits of military capabilities and endurance.
creator: Sune Engel Rasmussen

text: Trump plans to broker a deal between Putin and Zelensky, but skepticism is likely due to Moscow's past broken promises not to attack Ukraine.
creator: Alexander Ward

text: Palestinian-Americans face increasing hostility from Israeli settlers and soldiers in their ancestral West Bank home. The situation worsens an already difficult reality for those who have returned to their homeland.
creator: Omar Abdel-Baqui

text: President Trump has become the leading decision maker in the semiconductor sector, with recent actions including new fees on exports to China and a brief demand for a CEO's firing.
creator: Tripp Mickle

text: An ancient penis worm with rings of sharp teeth has been discovered in the Grand Canyon, dating back to 500 million years ago and serving as an ancestor to modern phallic marine worms.
creator: Marta Abbà

text: The West Texas measles outbreak has ended, killing two children from an undervaccinated community.
creator: Emily Mullin

text: Ibrahim Abuowda, a 13-year-old boy from Gaza, was injured in an explosion and doctors said he wouldn't survive. His mother was determined to get him medical treatment in the U.S.
creator: Chao Deng

text: Big Tech's A.I. Data Centers Could Cause Electricity Rate Hikes for Everyone
creator: Ivan Penn and Karen Weise

text: A.I.-powered travel tools can help plan trips and squeeze value out of loyalty programs, but don't give up Google Flights just yet.
creator: Gabe Castro-Root

text: Experts propose converting Caribbean sargassum into biofuel, biogas, and construction materials to combat record-breaking quantities hitting Mexico's beaches. The plan aims to underwrite carbon credits and provide sustainable solutions for the growing seaweed problem.
creator: Edith González Cruz

Sure! Here is a two-line summary of the article:

Handwriting may be on the brink of extinction as technology advances and typing becomes more convenient. However, some argue that this could have positive effects on creativity and cognitive development.
creator: Angela Watercutter

text: The electric constant determines the force between electrical charges and is crucial for the existence of the universe as we know it. Without it, the universe would be a primordial soup with no life.
creator: Rhett Allain
